function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unanticipated shock to macroeconomic variables leading to negative or positive responses for NPL/L","Impact":"Increase in NPL/L and financial instability","Mitigation":"Implement risk management strategies and stress testing for banks","Technologies":"Risk management software, stress testing models","People":"Banks, financial institutions","Owner":"Risk management teams, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on GDP growth affecting NPL/L of banks in ASEAN countries","Impact":"Fluctuations in NPL/L and financial instability","Mitigation":"Develop contingency plans, monitor economic indicators, and implement risk management strategies for banks","Technologies":"Economic monitoring tools, risk management software","People":"Banks, financial institutions, policymakers","Owner":"Risk management teams, regulatory authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Transition through different stages of the pandemic affecting GDP and in turn NPL/L of banks","Impact":"Uncertainty in NPL/L and financial operations","Mitigation":"Regular assessment of economic conditions, scenario planning, and stress testing for banks","Technologies":"Scenario analysis tools, financial modeling software","People":"Banks, financial institutions, policymakers","Owner":"Risk management teams, regulatory authorities, government agencies"}]}
